website_summaries.verdict: This sturdy, simple, handsome metal headboard with padded inserts lends a contemporary look to your room.
pros: Padded inserts unscrew and pop out for cleaning or re-upholstering
Metal has a subtle matte finish
Great price for a headboard of this size and heft
cons: Reports of problems with misalignment when attaching headboard and bed frame
Occasionally delivered with some missing hardware that’s easily replaceable

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Frame
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: If you're buying the Zinus Quick Snap TM 18 Inch Platform Bed Frame, you do NOT need the brackets the website indicates are optional of the package. This fits the frame without any additional parts. OUTSTANDING BED! BUY THIS! Very easy to put together!!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good Headboard at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a purple mattress and base and was looking for a new headboard as I had replaced my Queen bed with a King. I like the modern look of the headboard and it compliments the rest of my room well. The frame seems well constructed and was packaged well. The instructions are simple and it assembled and installed to my bed frame in less than 15 minutes (using a drill/driver to drive in the small bolts instead of the supplied allen wrench).
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard, all around!
customer_reviews.text: I really couldn't be happier. I wasn't expecting much since there was only 1 review, at the time of my purchase, but I'm so glad I made the choice to buy this headboard. I really like the fact that it's all metal and none of that cheap wood that I've seen too many times. Also, the cushion on the headboard is very soft. For the price, this really can't be beat. Lastly, assembly was so easy a child could do it...
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: Solid Headboard
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance buying (twin) with no review..but glad I did. The headboard came VERY well packaged, including hardware and SIMPLE instructions. Took about 10 mins to assemble and you DO NOT need additional tools. Well-made, heavy duty aluminum frame along with very nice padded area with quality material with solid seams. This will last a long time! *** Only negative is that there is no additional brackets to install to frame... MAKE SURE to measure.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Nies

customer_reviews.title: Simple elegance
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the simplicity of this headboard! It’s steady and does the job. It was quite easy to install to our king size bed, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Although the headboard was easy to assemble it does not line up to fit the frame. Very frustrating. It’s close but not close enough. When I called customer service they told me to buy a new bed and he did not understand why I was not happy with that response.
customer_reviews.author: DOCTKSK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described by the seller {55"= perfect match for my twin size bed}
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery by the seller. The item came carefully & properly packaged. Exactly as described by the seller {55"= perfect match for my twin size bed}. Minimal assembly required. Love the subtle blending of colors. Goes really well with my ocean blue bedroom wall paint. Overall, this is an excellent quality product & very reasonably priced! Thank you Amazon for carrying this item :)!
customer_reviews.author: MAY

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought an adjustable bed and decided we needed a head board to go along with it. Now this does not attach anywhere to the bed, you have to wall mount it (we expected that). Some people sat to place a frame around the entire adjustable bed so you can add a head/baseboard and bed skirt but wall mounting works just fine. The quality is amazing and it looks modern and slick (just what we wanted) I would definitely buy this again, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: desirae waltman

customer_reviews.title: Nice metal finish - fabric and foam look "fair to good"
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking basic headboard. Easy to put together (I used a drill/driver with a hex bit). I attached mine to the wall using a flush bracket. The metal is nicely finished 9 or 10 out of 10. The fabric looks nice - 7 or 8 - the foam behind the fabric is cheap so if you push on the fabric, it slides a bit and takes on the shape where you pressed - but it returns to normal - this makes it look a bit basic or cheap, but not bad. This isn't a high-style or high-end looking piece but it would be fine for a kid's room, dorm or basic apartment.
customer_reviews.author: asb

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, the 1-2-3 instruction is straightforward and easy to follow (much easier than IKEA's instructions, lol). Also it works perfectly with the Zinus 14-inch SmartBase, when used with Bracket together. One thing to note, however, the bed head is a little bit too tall, so even with my 14-inch SmartBase and 8-inch memory foam mattress, there is still some space in between the board and the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: URIZ.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, with one modification...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to attach to a Zinus Shawn 14 Inch bed frame via the available adapter plates. The headboard is 48 inches tall and looks out of proportion to the bed, so I cut 10 inches off the headboard legs, drilled 4 new mounting holes in the headboard legs and bolted it together. Now it all looks proportionally correct. PS. I was able to reuse the plastic end caps from the headboard legs do I won't be scratching the floor. Now I am 100% pleased!
customer_reviews.author: riorust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Purple Platform Frame!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a new Purple bed with the Purple platform frame. I chose this headboard over the Amazon one when I saw one review mention this headboard works for the Purple platform frame. That person spoke the truth. Easy assembly, easy to attach to the platform frame, and is a perfect fit.Also love how the headboard looks. Keep in mind this headboard is all metal (in case you like the look/feel of wood). The metal actually works out for us better, as my dog developed a habit of trying to scratch the wall in the headboard area (pre-Purple bed and headboard). She does NOT like to scratch the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Happy looks nice! Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought with base of the same brand, the holes didn't line up but we just drilled some. So far really happy!! Hight is great, without a boxspring which is exactly what I wanted! Easy to put together with a couple basic tools and my bfs help haha! Also had to had some hardware of our own due to the fact it was missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Misty M

customer_reviews.title: Great cheaper headboard for metal beds.
customer_reviews.text: I found putting this together very easy. I was a tiny bit confused about the tall sides because I thought the loops went inside the metal of the base but it is attached to the back. The poles on the ends of my 19 inch high square corner metal bed was about 1/4 of an inch off but the included long screws, two washers and a wing nut pulled it all together and the difference is not noticable. The two padded areas can be re-covered with different material if you wish because the frame where the material is located is screwed on. All said and done, I love the look! I love the price and I love the easy asymbly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headboard
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this headboard. It was super easy to put together and even easier to install. I have a Zinus bed frame and we ordered the brackets that match that frame and it perfectly connected to the headboard. I was able to un-box it, assemble it, and install it to my bed frame in less than 30 minutes. One thing that is also really cool about the headboard is that the upholstered panels are separate from the metal posts so if you want to change the fabric to match your decor you absolutely can. I cannot believe that we waited so long to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: A. James

customer_reviews.title: Headboard is 2-3 inches too tall.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Full size Zinus Demetric 14-Inch bed frame and Linenspa 8-Inch Hybrid Mattress. I recommend them both if you want a sturdy frame you can store things under and reasonably priced mattress. Zinus Barbara headboard (installed with the separately purchased Zinus brackets) leaves a big 3-inch gap. Zinus should have made the headboard more customizable if you had thinner than 10-inch mattress. You'll also want to use the bolts in the Zinus brackets because the ones that come with headboard are very long. One of threads on the headboard where you screw in the legs also has a thread misalignment. Overall I like the look and am keeping the headboard. Just very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: avg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is quite good quality. It could not be easier to assemble! It's surprisingly solid for something that comes in a box like that. The finish on the black painted metal is really, really great and the Grey cloth is nice. For $50, it's a win. I feel like it will work with most twin beds due to the way they made the slots for the screws. I had a special, out of the ordinary, application for it, so I had to cut it down a bit (hack saw or angle grinder) and it worked great, so you can modify it easily, but I don't think most people will need to do any modification at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pretzel-boy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect for the Job!
customer_reviews.text: We are in the process of flipping our house so I felt a headboard would add to the appearance of the master bedroom, and it has. Normally, I don't like a headboard or foot-board on the bed, somehow I get trapped in them. I've had no problems with this headboard. What I really like is that I can take the gray panels out and replace the fabric at a later time, or when we flip another house. It was easy to assemble, at least my husband didn't complain, and he likes it too. For the price, it's tough to compete. Looks very nice with the other black furniture in the room. I believe it made the room look bigger too.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My bed in my college apartment is against a window, and I don't really have space to move it & have it against a wall. This headboard takes care of that issue pretty well. I have a frame from a different manufacturer, but the board fit perfectly! One issue I have is that the board doesn't feel very sturdy; there's some play when I shake it. I haven't had issues since I installed it a month ago, but I'm still very cautious when I lean against it. If your bed is against a wall, then you shouldn't have any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Murad M.

customer_reviews.title: Of course you need a headboard!
customer_reviews.text: After losing pillow after pillow, I decided to look for an inexpensive yet sturdy headboard for my Zinus twin bed frame. This one, black metal with gray upholstery, was nice enough and priced reasonably. I have been extremely happy with Zinus bed frames, so why not? Previously, I had purchased the brackets (you will need them on SOME BUT NOT ALL metal frames). It has taken me about one hour of leisurely assembly to put the brackets and headboard on. Difficulty level is 3/10 (a bit heavy and clumsy to move and hold). Actual bolt and wing nut assembly is so easy a five year old could do it with supervision. Recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: MCASguru

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Product
customer_reviews.text: It is always easy to be fooled by the numerous positive reviews for a product. Such is the case with this headboard. The headboard is quite easy to assemble. However, upon installation of it to the bed frame having a mattress of 10 inch thick, a big gap of about 5 inches exists between the top of the mattress and the bottom of the headboard as shown in the enclosed photo. There was no options to adjust the height of the headboard to alleviate this problem. Wish the company thought about this very obvious issue before releasing this product. Greatly disappointed with this headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: IKEA-like attention to design
customer_reviews.text: IKEA pioneered the concept of making things easy to assemble for consumers. Zinus has done the same with its beds and headboards. Parts are numbered and the instructions walk you through the snap together and tighten fasteners steps. The resulting structure is reasonable sturdy given the price point. There are a couple of notable negatives though. First, there's really not an easy way of determining which of their many bedframes is compatible. The install kit has nice fasteners for their mainstream units, but literally includes a long bolt and wingnut combination for their popular studio platform frame. Fortunately, it works, but it's a bit cheesy. Second, the gray fabric much darker than shown in the photo - closer to charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: CountryLane

customer_reviews.title: Super look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The headboard was easy to put together. The padding is thick and does not look "cheap". I installed it on a Zinus 14" metal Smartbase (sold separately). I put felt self stick pads on the back of the headboard to prevent scratching the fresh paint. The bolts that came with the headboard to attach to bed frame are to long and you can't tighten the wing nut all the way. I used the other bolts that came with the bed frame. I bought the Zinus Ultima Comfort 13 Inch Deluxe Euro Box Top Spring Mattress, Queen for it. The whole set up cost less than $700.00. It will be used for the guest bedroom. We are pleased with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: good quality great price...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter so she could sit in bed and use it to support her torso while she uses her laptop. She prefers to use the laptop pad and this headboard as her sit up desk. It supports her weight well. I am pleased with my purchase. Super easy to assemble. Did not need the additional hooks I purchased. It bolted right up to her bed frame perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PoolFixer

customer_reviews.title: Quality control.. Check the product first... Before it goes in the box huh...
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm the latest so called customer or just ticked person to receive a damaged Zinus product. But answer me this, how is a product is damaged in the box but the shipping box itself... is next to pristine. No holes, rips or tears.. But because I'm handy... I made it work. Lack of qualify control isn't the best way to retain customers... So this will be the last Zinus product of any type... for me....
customer_reviews.author: G. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Horribllllleeeeeeeee
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this item was what the other reviews had written about it, I love the design but sadly I got a shitty one with no directions and nails longer than a giraffes neck that do NOT FIT what’s so ever! Disappointed but yet not as much because what do you get for such a low price? Crap!
customer_reviews.author: Luis  Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Clean and simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headboard for my sons bed. It is nice and clean, and looks good in his room. It was packaged well, and was easy to assemble. The only issue was connecting it to the frame. Since this is made for a Zinus frame, I had to switch out the mounting bolts to make it work with his bed frame. No big deal with bolts I had around the house. I also put a little piece of foam tape on the top corners, to keep the headboard from bouncing off the wall. This is a nice, modern headboard, and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: First off, this thing is super sturdy. Not at all what I expected. It's built from pretty heavy gauge metal so it should last forever and the fabric inserts can be removed and recovered if necessary so that's pretty nice. The assembly couldn't be easier, screw the supports to the headboard and you're done, and everything you need is provided. I was worried that I might need something to attach it to my frame, but it fit into the existing slots perfectly. Took me about 20 minutes and it looks great. I wish everything was this easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Conti

customer_reviews.title: Brackets should come with this...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this headboard for my son’s bedroom. Did not even think I needed to prefer brackets separately until I realized after putting the headboard together that the box did not include any. I assumed, my bad. So I have to now order brackets. I’ll update my review when I receive them. I love Zinus but seriously, just add the brackets in the box with your headboards! Other than that, the headboard is quite nice. SUPER EASY to put together. Less than 15 minutes tops if you can count and put pre-k puzzles together lol
customer_reviews.author: NeoshaLoves

customer_reviews.title: Use washers on both sides of the headboard and bracket (2) for best results!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this headboard. Between this and the black bed-skirt, it's really a Handsome, Rich design. I wanted a masculine headboard, and I got it. This is really well designed, attaches to the Zinus bracket easily, and even comes with it's own rachet! Don't make the mistake I made and only use a washer on the headboard side as shown in the instructions. Use a washer on the bracket side too or the wingnut can slip right through the bracket hole leaving you with an unattached headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rayster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and a great value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the easiest products To assemble. It took me about 15 to 20 minutes to put together. It’s very smartly designed. And is a great value for the money. I wanted a headboard to go with an adjustable bed that I recently bought. The bed frame was not designed to attach a headboard. So I bought this to simply place against the wall. It works perfectly. One cannot tell that the headboard is not part of the bed. At first I thought I might have to attach the headboard to the wall, but it’s sturdy enough and have enough to leanBehind the head of the bed without moving.
customer_reviews.author: RobtSal

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble! Came will tools, you need nothing to assemble. There were long bolts to attach to frame. I did have to lift box spring up to have better angle but the box spring was able to fit even with long bolts. They couldn’t make it any easier to assemble. Was super surprised, thought the metal frame would look cheap, but not at all. Bought for sons room, has a queen size bed. The top is really nice because he likes to have a clip on light for reading and worked way better than what we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast assembly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a head board that would ship to our APO box, which isn't easy to find. This was an inexpensive option, so I thought I would give it a try. It arrived quickly, and was super easy to put together. I assembled by myself, in maybe 10 minutes. It's very sturdy and attached easily to our metal frame. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. James

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the headboard arrived damaged. The box appeared to have been opened but retaped. You’ll notice from the top right of the picture, it’s completely bent and looks horrible. I’m disappointed because I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it (arrived in a huge box!) but now I’m stuck with a bent, busted up headboard. It’s too bad because other than that, it’s handsome looking and the cushion on headboard is of nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Millisa CraigBourke

customer_reviews.title: Great looking headboard but.
customer_reviews.text: First off this is a great headboard. Solid construction and nice aesthetic. SUPER easy to assemble. I'm docking one star because it doesn't fit the Elite Smartbase frame as expected. While I did order the universal headboard brackets, this headboard's slots don't line up with the expected slots on the brackets. It took me a while to figure out that the long screws need to go through the CORNER holes on the brackets. This setup seems less secure than the slots that are shown in the bracket instructions and a bit more difficult in slotting the screw in. However, I managed to get everything tightened down and it seems secure for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sam G

customer_reviews.title: guest room headboard
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the queen taupe tufted headboard and it worked perfectly with our zinus platform bed without any adjustments. The included screws for attaching the headboard to the frame are very long, but since our bed doesn't have a box spring, that wasn't a problem. I added a few felt pads to the corner so somebody can lean back and the metal won't scratch the wall. Looks great. Almost no gap between mattress and bottom of headboard--again, platform bed with regular mattress. It's day 2 and still giving off a chemical odor, but hoping that dissipates in the coming weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This took less than 30 minutes to assemble and install. All the needed tools are included and Zinus includes EXTRA screws, washers and wingnuts. I wish all manufacturers of self-assembly furniture did that. It’s topped off with a thank you note that makes you feel they really do care. I bought the Zinus brackets as well (reuired) and it all fit my Amazon brand bed platform perfectly. I couldn’t be happier-well I would be happier if the box had arrived with $50,000 in unmarked $100 bills with non-sequential serial numbets inside. The product itself beats my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking....no mounting equipment included...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this headboard due too it’s clean look and good reviews. I’m glad it’s metal and not wood. It does look sharp and dress up the bed. The biggest issue we had was mounting it to our existing frame which is a motion bed frame. The bed frame came with its own brackets for future headboard mounting, however it was very awkward to try to install and the headboard is extremely loose. I’m hoping to find a better solution, otherwise this headboard is just a piece of art and useless to lean on.
customer_reviews.author: trlyka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headboard to use with my Olee Sleep 14" heavy duty metal bed frame I also purchased from Amazon. It fit well with all hardware included, looks beautiful, and was very easy to put together. All parts were well marked with clear directions for assembly and even extra parts were included. Total assembly was maybe 10 minutes for the headboard itself and another 5-10 to attach to the frame. I would highly recommend it and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Delta38

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looker!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, well built and it really looks sharp. Even though my platform frame is from a different manufacturer, I was able to make it work with just some strong zip ties. I didn't have the opportunity to try and find brackets or do any drilling, due to being smack dab in the middle of moving, but trust me it's not moved an inch since I mounted it to my frame. If you like this style and are looking for some quality, then you can't beat this headboard at this price!
customer_reviews.author: heartwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice !! With frame hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a great product. The cushions look nice. The frame and interconnecting bar are made from steel with ears welded to the frame. Where the frame contacts the floor/rug has a plastic glide. And my question on ordering was did it come with hardware to connect it to a standard boxspring frame. Yes !! Took about 20 min to assemble and install without reading the instructions. Am very pleased with it. The only issue I had was the bolts are very long to accomdate all situations. That said, once assembed they can be cut/broke off with plyers (wiggle back and forth).
customer_reviews.author: John P Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to assemble. It took me exactly 38 minutes to assemble and attach to bed frame. It would have taken less time if I had someone to hold the headboard as I bolted it to the frame. The upholstery is quite nice and you can easily remove the cushion and re-upholster the headboard if you get tired of the fabric. I was quite surprised at the quality of the product considering it very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rousselle

customer_reviews.title: cheaper than I can build it. good quality.
customer_reviews.text: old mechanics trick, suggest putting all screws in 1/4 finger loose to start, then tighten up outside ones first. Went together with no problems, well packed so no damage to painted frame. Fit twin frame perfectly with out extra kit. long bolts to go through wood bed frames. Had to cut them off, better to cut than be too short. Entire unit, square and flat, very slight imperfection in uphostry material, hard to see. I couldn't smell and kind of smell from the head board. I couldn't build this for the price that they delivered it for. Thanks ZINUS
customer_reviews.author: Lonfu

customer_reviews.title: This full size headboard does not fit full size Zinus Demetric 14 Inch Elite SmartBase Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and attractive headboard, and very easy to put together. Unfortunately, this headboard is about 1 inch to wide to fit the Zinus Demetric 14 Inch Elite SmartBase Mattress Foundation (with headboard mounting brackets Zinus Headboard Bracket, Set of 2). Hence the one star. I would have thought that a full size headboard and full size bed from the same manufacturer would be compatible. Also the Zinus customer service is a block hole, numerous emails and tickets unanswered for over two weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks way more expensive than it is, goes together in minutes. Quality headboard for the $
customer_reviews.text: If you even think you will like this, then you will be thrilled. It looks and feels high-end. I was planning on it being a little generic and not overly great quality because of the price point but I just needed something quick for a kids room. I was surprised how nice it was. I'm not sure how they can make this for the price. I'm not saying it is the greatest headboard in the world but I'm telling you that it seems like a 200 dollar plus item. There is only 12 bolts to put in and it is very obvious where they go, it took me 8 minutes to put together and they provided the wrench. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I stan IKEA, but I really didn’t want to pay a lot for a headboard AND figure out how to get it home or pay to ship it. Now I want to see what else Zinnus has, because this headboard was a breeze to pick up off my porch and assemble as soon as I got home from work. The box is almost as tall as me. I just hugged it and used my legs, baby. Though to be SAFE, you should grab a buddy. Space in the box was used efficiently and they don’t use that annoying styrofoam that chips apart and gets stuck on your pets! Came with a cute note and stationary, too. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sara without the “h”

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but doesn't stay 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this head board looks and my son enjoys the comfort of the back of it, but it was not the easiest to assemble. The holes would not line up correctly with the leg slots and brackets. I managed to get it together, but now I have to tighten the bolts about once a month or the frame wobbles, not sure if I did something wrong here. I bought the headboard and brackets that was matched up with the bed I bought the previous year. 🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the button tufted gray, which I thought looked the best in the pictures. It actually looks better in person. Installation was easy on the Zinus 14" metal bedframe. Don't forget to order the brackets. They are a separate, but necessary, item. The headboard is solid and contemporary. It did arrive a little damaged, so look it over carefully before you assemble it. I think the packaging could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: gtdad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I didn't go with the bad reviews on this product. First of all if it had come damaged Amazon would have replaced it. Second of all I put it together in about 5 minutes and then hooked it to my generic bed frame and another 10 minutes. The bolts came to attach it to the frame and like one review said they were so long that they did impede the mattress however I just used a hacksaw and cut them off. I absolutely love the quality the look and it's nice to be able to sit up in bed now!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Richards

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect to frame
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twin frame and this headboard for my 12 year old son. They are sturdy, good quality and look nice but the headboard has holes to attach to a frame and the frame (from this exact same company) doesn't have pre-cut holes to attach the headboard. I first tried to attach it to the wall but the drywall wasn't supportive enough. I eventually got some thick black zip-ties and rigged it up. It will suffice for now but eventually I will consider drilling holes in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Booker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The headboard looks fine. Mine arrived missing a cap. I have repeatedly asked Zinus to send one and they won’t. They continue to say I am within the return window. I explained I don’t want to return it and simply want the cap. They say I need to contact Amazon but when I enter the problem in the Amazon app it says contact Zinus. Terrible customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Norris

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this head board first of all it is comfortable to lean back, it is nice looking, great price and NOT cheap looking, the only thing is it doesn't quite match my room so I love the off label use of being able to change the fabric as another few reviewers did, it's partly why I purchased this, I was really doubting whether I even needed a headboard but I'm really glad I did wind up getting this! If you found this helpful in anyway please let me know thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product at a great price. All hardware and tools required for assembly are included. Assembly takes about 15 minutes. We had a frame we have used in our guest bedroom for about 35 years. This headboard attached perfectly to that old frame. I did have to use 4 of my own bolts because the ones provided with the headboard were too long. I didn’t find that to be a great inconvenience. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Texa$ TC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 queen sized.I cut the legs off and added the plastic tab from the bottom of the legs. Next I mounted both to the wall with an aluminum cleat. Looks great and will last for a very long time. Assembly was very easy I put them together by myself and it took 10 minutes each.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: The most satisfying order I have ever made from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing dissatisfying about this product. Like I mentioned in the title, this is hands-down the best purchase I have ever made from Amazon. There's nothing particularly exciting about a headboard, but the ease of assembly was so refreshing. Everything was well-packaged and the labelling scheme made it incredibly simple to assemble. I also have to praise Zinus for their personal notes and commitment to recycling. All around fantastic experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vinyard

customer_reviews.title: Good. Needs an extra. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and install were easy. Not the most sturdy piece but enough to keep things from touching the walls. I added some felt pads on the top corners of the frame where the bolts were since the bolts had put marks in the paint. I would suggest adding felt pads to the corner of this to anyone who moves even the slightest while sleeping or when getting in and out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Clean Line Modern Headboard
customer_reviews.text: Keep your expectations in line with the price and this is a excellent deal. Pretty sturdy sleek modern headboard with a simple lines. My one nit-pick is wish they offered some shorter bolts along with the long ones included to accommodate more bed frames. However a quick trip to the hardware store solved this. I would still recommend this headboard!
customer_reviews.author: John McHaffie

customer_reviews.title: Smart and Contemporary Look
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was perfect for completing my guest room. It required assembly which was quite simple with instructions that you could not screw up. Even the two Allen-Wrenches needed were included. I had it assembled and set up in less than 20 minutes. It fit perfectly on a Queen size frame and it looks amazing. The quality is great, the look is awesome and the resemblance to the picture provided on Amazon is spot on! Definitely recommend this item. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, I just wish there was a way to secure it to the frame a little tighter. I had to purchase headboard brackets for my 18 inch frame but both task were easy. Finally glad to have something to sit up against. There is a little gap between the frame and headboard but my 14 inch mattress is too large to fit or slide through that. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to set up. The holes on the headboard didn't match up with my frame, so my dad was kind enough to drill new holes and get it attached. I just have a mattress (queen) without a box spring, so the headboard sits about 6 inches over the mattress. I just prop my pillows up a bit to cover the gap and it works great! The cloth is a nice material, it doesn't look cheap at all! I like the panels because if I'm ready for a change I think it would be easy to reupholster with a new design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Super easy to assemble and install, took me less than 20 mins by myself. I purchased for my 4 yr daughter's bed and I believe it will hold up for years. Only downside is the delivery, the box was very beaten up. However the product was not hurt at all so still 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Deannaca G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit it's own frame
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT FIT FRAME EVEN WITH UNIVERSAL/ZINUS HEADBOARD BRACKETS. NOR DOES IT JUST FIT THE BED
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for its price
customer_reviews.text: We bought the headboard for a young man's bed. Looks good. The upholstery not bad. There is a technical possibility to change the upholstery if it is gets dirty or the owner wants another hue. The only one minus is that the headboard is not sturdy and bangs to the wall. If you glue a piece of something soft from the back side of the headboard the problem will be solved minding your wall. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Solid. Comfortable. ...and there are hookers apparently.
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Had a minor scuff, but it was a "Warehouse Deal" so that was expected. Assembled in about 5 minutes. Give the foam and fabric time to find its shape. Took about a week to fully come back to picture perfect. My son got a room refresh this summer. He loves it. Says its very comfortable for leaning while stealing cars, gun running, and servicing hookers on "GTA". In hindsight, I should have made his room LESS comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lester McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: love the headboard. It was easy to put together. The cushions actually came already in the piece it was in so assembly was really easy. It makes my bed look much nicer. No defects on it when it came.. I have my matress pushing it against the wall since the brackets I also purchased didn't line up and I'm not handy to make new holes. My matress is heavy enough that nothing moves when i toss and turn.. i also put felt pads on each corner so it really doesn't move toward the wall. I have many pillows so you can only see the top cushion but overall would definately purchase again. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: tiana taylor

customer_reviews.title: Bed Frame Bolts TOO Long
customer_reviews.text: Attractive unit when assembled. Connecting the vertical supports for the headboard no problem. The 4 bolts to connect the vertical supports to the bed frame were at least 2" too long. An option is to cut them to length with a hacksaw. I chose to replace with 2" bolts. The original bolts are metric, so easier to replace with standard. A bit tricky to connect and tighten. Gave the original bolts and wing nuts to a gal at a Starbucks who had a lot of piercings. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: TommyO

customer_reviews.title: Does not include brackets for frames
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with the brackets as I had assumed it would have. I bought this to go with my 14 inch Zinus frame but it needs brackets to attach it to the frame. For now I'm just going to sandwich it between the wall and the frame since it is not moving or making any noise when I move around in bed. Very easy to assemble with clear instructions, attractive design, and quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Dunham

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple headboard for my bed. I ordered this hoping that I could attach it to the wall, since I have an adjustable bed and no real frame to attach to. I put it together (5 minutes, tops) and put at the head of my bed. I found that even though it’s not attached to anything, it sits back there just fine and doesn’t move. It’s a win win. It looks nice and didn’t break the bank. I’m going to order one for my guest room too.
customer_reviews.author: Factors

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Product
customer_reviews.text: I own a zinus mattress and bed frame and was in love with the brand but this headboard changed it all. It is not sturdy at all. Installation instructions are poor and I could not find any online videos to out this product together. I have attached pictures of how the headboard is not perfectly aligned and keeps moving back & forth. Wish i could get a refund on this terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headboard to put on my Zinus bed frame. You do need to purchase the bracket set, but it is so worth it. The company just gives you good feelings. My shipment came with greeting cards that I could send to other people and an extra tool! It makes you feel cared about. But the real awesome thing about the products from this company is how easy they are to put together. The instructions are simple and super easy to follow. I could easily put together the bedframe, put the brackets on, assemble the headboard, and attach it to the bed in 45 minutes. By myself!! I am super impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Their products should work together
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t even fit the Zinus queen size bed frame that I bought . Makes no sense. The wholes don’t line up so I literally have it leaning against my wall
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and what a difference it made! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: C.Jord

customer_reviews.title: This is awesomely customizable
customer_reviews.text: Have the twin size version for child's room. It is just enough cushion to be comfortable but also a clean and modern look with the black metal. You can easily cover the gray panels with any choice of fabric. Will be ordering the queen size for the master bedroom. Plan to change and cover with faux fur fabric as well!! This did not fit the bed frame but it is light enough to use heavy duty command strips to attach to the wall securely.
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy and stylish headboard.
customer_reviews.text: It is very low profile. We had a pretty tall headboard before, so that’s been an adjustment. It is well made and easy to put together. I am a fan of Zinus products. They are sturdy and quiet. I’ve gotten used to the low profile and appreciate the padding. It is so sturdy and well padded that I can lean on it and it’s like being on a sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny Happy People

customer_reviews.title: Very specific
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headboard expect for the part where it only connects to a very specific type of bedframe. I guess it's my mistake for not noticing you need a 'smartframe' but when I already own a bedframe from the SAME COMPANY it's expected the products work together. After building mine it now leans against the wall between my bed and wall.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: Nice headboard
customer_reviews.text: Quality is quite good for the price ($70) and the instructions are the clearest I've ever seen - I wish Ikea would use the same format! It's adjustable to fit various frames, and I think they offer brackets if needed. It my 18" Olee queen frame perfectly, without any brackets. Total assembly time was about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bozos

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Value, but a little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This headboard looks great and you cant beat the price! but its a little wobbly (even if you tighten the screws very tight). Maybe they can fix it if they put a thicker base at the bottom of the legs? You can definitely sit up and lean on it if you're just laying in bed, but if you have sex too hard its going to bang the wall behind it. Just letting you know.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Headboard does not fit the metal frame of Zinus twin ...
customer_reviews.text: Headboard does not fit the metal frame of Zinus twin bed I purchased. Beware! "Available in Twin, full, Queen and King with bed frame and mattress sold separately". Misleading to me! I'm having a garage sale so maybe I can recoup some of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: so I wasted two days waiting to order that part when it ...
customer_reviews.text: You DO need the brackets if you are attaching this to the Zinus 18" platform. Someone said we didn't, so I wasted two days waiting to order that part when it came. Seems sturdy and well made. I have no complaints except that I wish it came in white.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: What the ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid $95 for a this twin size headboard and it didn’t come with anything to attach it to my existing bed frame . Now it’s on here for $61 ??? What a waste of money and time !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well packaged and has to be the easiest part of putting together our bedroom furniture! The parts all have numbered holes, so you just line them up, tighten up the bolts and you are good to go. It looks really nice, and like I spent way more then I did. Great headboard for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap headboard
customer_reviews.text: The frame looks good, but quality is bad. You get what you pay for. Some bolts are very difficult to screw on, the holes on the headboard dont match the openings on the brackets they sell for those. The metal is very bendy, so as you screw on tighter it bends. The headboard is not sturdy at all. It is flapping around like a leaf in the wind, although i made sure all bolts were securely tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelina Ivanova

customer_reviews.title: This work great on my Sleep Number Queen Size Bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! The box arrived in perfect condition. It took 10 minutes to assemble and about 20 to install. I have a sleep number bed and used the adaptive brackets from the company. The only thing I couldn't do was adjust the height. Both bracket and headboard have a slide up and down for attachment. It attaches well and sits on the floor. The 2 photos show the relationship to the bed height. I usually leave my pillows on the bed, so the distance from the mattress doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love this headboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice headboard - unfortunately, our cats think it's their litterbox and they've peed on it multiple times. What is miraculous is how this thing absorbs pee! The pee doesn't even drip onto the bed or the pillows! Amazing....I know, it's gross too. But if you're gonna have cats that pee, this is the headboard to get!
customer_reviews.author: marnster

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made headboard for the price and I (senior lady) put it together by myself and attached it to the queen bed myself. Hand clap. Wanted a neutral color to go with beige, taupe, etc. This headboard color states taupe but it is really more of a light beige. Look at the taupe color in the pillow shams in the photos. I used the thick soft foam pieces from the packaging to place behind the metal frame/against the wall so it doesn't move. Did a lot of looking and this price was very fair. The headboard arrived in a solid box - no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on a beautiful headboard!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this headboard and feel confident knowing it will continue to be stylish down the road. The back comes off the headboard so changing the fabric will be a snap if I ever choose to change the look in my bedroom. The only issue we had was attaching it to our bed frame. The holes did not line up, so our screws are in at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know the size of your bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this headboard! If you still have beds without a headboard, this one is the one to get! Make sure to check your bed size, whether it's a king size, queen, full, or sing. I have experience with installing full and queen size, so I know they work. Maybe next step is to get floorboards.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chornesky

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: 15 minutes to assemble by one not very handy person. To hook up to bed frame is straight forward but the screws supplies are way too long so poke at the wall putting dents in the dry wall. I went and got my own. Sturdy enough. Can lean and sit up in bed. Overall pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can customize it easily
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to DIY a headboard with denim material and saw this headboard cheaper than sourcing all the separate material. Spray painted the black metal frame and easily covered the grey upholstery but left it in tack if I ever changed it back. Steardy, great price easy to put together. Put larger diameter washers for the bolts when I attached the headboard to the bed rails. Thankfully I found this a gave it a try. Neighbor asked me to make one for her. Great buy, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy headboard that was a breeze to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This headboard attached to my Zinus bed frame very easily. It's sturdy, didn't have any scratches, and I really like how it looks in my room. I have a pretty thick mattress so I wish I could raise this headboard just an inch higher but I'm unable to based on how the slots are located. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding headboard & an extreme bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a headboard to use with my adjustable bed. The quality is second to none, and the assembly is very simple. The headboard is well built, looks great, and extremely sturdy. To eliminate any noise from it hitting the wall when getting in and out of bed; I placed a few self adhesive felt pads on the back of the headboard. This item looks very nice, and is an extreme bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Expressed Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but you need to go buy better hardware to install after e few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Sets up quick and easy but even with the included washers the wingnuts and the smaller yet really really long bolts are not great. we had an issue with one of the bolts after 3 weeks and had to buy better hardware and Ace to replace the set. I works well now I just wish we didn't need to rebuy hardware to make it that way!
customer_reviews.author: Sunburan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Less than 10 minutes to put it all together fits right in. Cat approved! Adds to the look of the bed. The only thing I am surprised about is why wasn't this suggested to me when I bought the bed frame? Other than that I am happy with it. Oh it stinks to high heaven at first, but quickly dissipates.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard!  Has lasted for a teenage boy!
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is very easy to assemble and it's been in my sons room for at least two+ years now. Looks brand new still! my only complaint is the screws are really long and I don't have a tool to trim them so they've put little holes in the wall. However, I'm ok with that since the headboard looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka ZW

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon receipt and doesn't fit the frame
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had worked out because it looks nice but there were 2 points of damage (metal sheared and a bent connection point. Also, this headboard was about 1 inch short of fitting the king-size frame I bought it for. Unfortunately, the box sat on the floor for 6 months before I even had a chance to open the box so I was well outside the return period once I noticed it.
customer_reviews.author: Slayals

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a Zinus bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my bed frame! Looks absolutely amazing. Set up was not that difficult. I didn’t but extra brackets because my bed frame already had brackets. The only issue I had is that the screws that they provided to connect it with the bed frame we a bit too long.
customer_reviews.author: Zuberi Ashraf

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking headboard
customer_reviews.text: Love this headboard. Like anything, do not tighten screws one at a time. Start each screw slowly as the holes do not line up exactly. Slowly tighten each screw a few turns, move onto the next, then come back to the first and redo the process until all screws are completely tightened.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Not extact fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a Zinus smartbase bed frame, Cal King Size. I thought the King Size head board would fit, but I was wrong. The headboard will be 2 inchs wider on each side. I reverse the leg attachment so that it will fit, but it's attached with 2 screws instead of 4 on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Ye L.

customer_reviews.title: Super-chic for super cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headboard it is super expensive looking especially for the price. However you do need brackets to attach it to the frame. and it will definitely need some instructions when the brackets come on how to attach it to the frame because I can't seem to see how it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Manter

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Looks more expensive than it is. It took me 30 mins or so to recover it (with a $10 tapestry) and put it together. Also have a zinus bed frame, and it attached quickly and easily with no problems. This went in my teen’s room and she is really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: sarmarie29407

product_meta.title: Zinus Jessica Modern Studio Upholstered Metal Headboard, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:Upholstered| Color:GrayThis stunning metal and grey upholstered headboard by Zinus will make a perfect addition to any bedroom. With a classic shape and style, this headboard is well-constructed with foam padded upholstery. This upholstered and metal headboard provides a classic framework for a mattress. Another comfort innovation from Zinus.The slats of our platform beds are at frame level so mattresses sit on top of and not inside the bed frame.
feature_bullets: Classic Styling to match any Décor
Available in twin, full, Queen, and King
Bed frame and mattress sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,513 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
